title: About the Elementalist Lux master edition
body: So, I bought the standard edition and I noticed that the master edition is only 700 RP for me. Will it stay like this forever ?

replies.body: It's a flexible bundle, so the remaining RP is for the content you haven't unlocked yet.  Per the [Lux FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/233073948-Elementalist-Lux-FAQ#h1q2), the bundle will only be available until December 13th.  Hope that helps! clear things up!
the FAQ says the bundle is permanent to the shop? can you clarify please because it contradicts.
until when Master Elementalist Lux will be on sale? :)
